elements.name: Verify successful user login

steps.name: I set the POST request for endpoint "/api/login"
I set the request body with email "eve.holt@reqres.in" and "cityslicka"
I send the POST request
the response status code should be 200
the response body should contain "token"
the response body should match the JSON Schema "create_login_schema.json"

elements.name: Verify unsuccessful user login due to empty required fields

steps.name: I set the POST request for endpoint "/api/login"
I set the request body with email "eve.holt@reqres.in" and ""
I send the POST request
the response status code should be 400
the value of "error" should be "Missing password"

elements.name: Verify unsuccessful user login due to empty required fields

steps.name: I set the POST request for endpoint "/api/login"
I set the request body with email "" and "pistol"
I send the POST request
the response status code should be 400
the value of "error" should be "Missing email or username"

elements.name: Verify unsuccessful user login due to empty required fields

steps.name: I set the POST request for endpoint "/api/login"
I set the request body with email "" and ""
I send the POST request
the response status code should be 400
the value of "error" should be "Missing email or username"

elements.name: Verify unsuccessful user login due to empty required fields

steps.name: I set the POST request for endpoint "/api/login"
I set the request body with email "invalid_user" and "pistol"
I send the POST request
the response status code should be 400
the value of "error" should be "user not found"

name: Login a user
description:
As a user of the Reqres API
  I want to log in with my credentials
  So that I can validate the login API's POST functionality

elements.name: Verify successful user registration

steps.name: I set the POST request for endpoint "/api/register"
I set the request body with email "eve.holt@reqres.in" and "password123"
I send the POST request
the response status code should be 200
the response body should contain "id"
the response body should contain "token"
the response body should match the JSON Schema "create_register_schema.json"

elements.name: Verify unsuccessful user registration due to empty required fields

steps.name: I set the POST request for endpoint "/api/register"
I set the request body with email "sydney@fife" and ""
I send the POST request
the response status code should be 400
the value of "error" should be "Missing password"

elements.name: Verify unsuccessful user registration due to empty required fields

steps.name: I set the POST request for endpoint "/api/register"
I set the request body with email "" and "pistol"
I send the POST request
the response status code should be 400
the value of "error" should be "Missing email or username"

elements.name: Verify unsuccessful user registration due to empty required fields

steps.name: I set the POST request for endpoint "/api/register"
I set the request body with email "" and ""
I send the POST request
the response status code should be 400
the value of "error" should be "Missing email or username"

elements.name: Verify unsuccessful user registration due to empty required fields

steps.name: I set the POST request for endpoint "/api/register"
I set the request body with email "invalid_email" and "pistol"
I send the POST request
the response status code should be 400
the value of "error" should be "Note: Only defined users succeed registration"

name: Register a user
description:
As a user of the Reqres API
  I want to register a new user
  So that I can validate the registration API's POST functionality

elements.name: Verify successful retrieval of resource list

steps.name: I set the GET request for endpoint "/api/unknown"
I send the GET request
the response status code should be 200
the value of "page" should be "1"
the value of "per_page" should be "6"
the value of "total" should be "12"
the value of "total_pages" should be "2"
all fields in the "data" array should not be null
the response body should match the JSON Schema "resources_list_schema.json"

elements.name: Verify successful retrieval of the resource list with query parameters

steps.name: I set the GET request for endpoint "/api/unknown"
I send the GET request with query parameters:
the response status code should be 200
the value of "page" should be "2"
the value of "per_page" should be "6"
the value of "total" should be "12"
the value of "total_pages" should be "2"
all fields in the "data" array should not be null
the response body should match the JSON Schema "resources_list_schema.json"

elements.name: Verify unsuccessful retrieval with an invalid page number

steps.name: I set the GET request for endpoint "/api/unknown"
I send the GET request with query parameters "page" and "9999"
the response status code should be 200
the "data" array in the response body should be empty

name: List Resources
description:
As a user of the Reqres API
  I want to retrieve a list of resources using the Reqres API
  So that I can validate the API's GET functionality

elements.name: Verify successful retrieval of a single resource

steps.name: I set the GET request for endpoint "/api/unknown"
I send the GET request with query parameters "id" and "1"
the response status code should be 200
the response body should have valid fields "id, name, year, color, pantone_value"
the value of "data.id" should be "1"
the response body should match the JSON Schema "single_resource_schema.json"

elements.name: Verify successful retrieval of a single resource

steps.name: I set the GET request for endpoint "/api/unknown"
I send the GET request with query parameters "id" and "2"
the response status code should be 200
the response body should have valid fields "id, name, year, color, pantone_value"
the value of "data.id" should be "2"
the response body should match the JSON Schema "single_resource_schema.json"

elements.name: Verify successful retrieval of a single resource

steps.name: I set the GET request for endpoint "/api/unknown"
I send the GET request with query parameters "id" and "3"
the response status code should be 200
the response body should have valid fields "id, name, year, color, pantone_value"
the value of "data.id" should be "3"
the response body should match the JSON Schema "single_resource_schema.json"

elements.name: Verify unsuccessful retrieval with a non-existent or invalid resource ID

steps.name: I set the GET request for endpoint "/api/unknown"
I send the GET request with query parameters "id" and "9999"
the response status code should be 404
the response body should be empty "{}"

elements.name: Verify unsuccessful retrieval with a non-existent or invalid resource ID

steps.name: I set the GET request for endpoint "/api/unknown"
I send the GET request with query parameters "id" and "-1"
the response status code should be 404
the response body should be empty "{}"

elements.name: Verify unsuccessful retrieval with a non-existent or invalid resource ID

steps.name: I set the GET request for endpoint "/api/unknown"
I send the GET request with query parameters "id" and "abc"
the response status code should be 404
the response body should be empty "{}"

name: Retrieve a single resource
description:
As a user of the Reqres API
  I want to retrieve a single resource using the Reqres API
  So that I can validate the API's GET functionality for individual resources

elements.name: Verify successful user creation

steps.name: I set the POST request for endpoint "/api/users"
I set the request body with "morpheus" and "leader"
I send the POST request
the response status code should be 201
the value of "name" should be "morpheus"
the value of "job" should be "leader"
the response body should match the JSON Schema "create_user_schema.json"

elements.name: Verify successful user creation

steps.name: I set the POST request for endpoint "/api/users"
I set the request body with "neo" and "the one"
I send the POST request
the response status code should be 201
the value of "name" should be "neo"
the value of "job" should be "the one"
the response body should match the JSON Schema "create_user_schema.json"

elements.name: Verify unsuccessful user creation due to empty required fields

I set the request body with "" and "leader"
I send the POST request

the value of "name" should be ""
the value of "job" should be "leader"
the response body should match the JSON Schema "create_user_schema.json"

elements.name: Verify unsuccessful user creation due to empty required fields

steps.name: I set the POST request for endpoint "/api/users"
I set the request body with "morpheus" and ""
I send the POST request
the response status code should be 201
the value of "name" should be "morpheus"
the value of "job" should be ""
the response body should match the JSON Schema "create_user_schema.json"

elements.name: Verify unsuccessful user creation due to empty required fields

steps.name: I set the POST request for endpoint "/api/users"
I set the request body with "" and ""
I send the POST request
the response status code should be 201
the value of "name" should be ""
the value of "job" should be ""
the response body should match the JSON Schema "create_user_schema.json"

name: Create a user
description:
As a user of the Reqres API
  I want to create a new user using the Reqres API
  So that I can validate the API's POST functionality

elements.name: Verify successful user deletion

steps.name: I set the DELETE request for endpoint "/api/users" and "1"
I send the DELETE request
the response status code should be 204
the response body should be empty

elements.name: Verify successful user deletion

steps.name: I set the DELETE request for endpoint "/api/users" and "2"
I send the DELETE request
the response status code should be 204
the response body should be empty

elements.name: Verify unsuccessful user deletion for a non-existent user

steps.name: I set the DELETE request for endpoint "/api/users" and "9999"
I send the DELETE request
the response status code should be 204
the response body should be empty

elements.name: Verify unsuccessful user deletion for a non-existent user

steps.name: I set the DELETE request for endpoint "/api/users" and "1000"
I send the DELETE request
the response status code should be 204
the response body should be empty

name: Delete a user
description:
As a user of the Reqres API
  I want to delete an existing user using the Reqres API
  So that I can validate the API's DELETE functionality

elements.name: Users list successful retrieval

steps.name: I set the GET request for endpoint "/api/users"
I send the GET request
the response status code should be 200
the value of "page" should be "1"
the value of "per_page" should be "6"
the value of "total" should be "12"
the value of "total_pages" should be "2"
all fields in the "data" array should not be null
the response body should match the JSON Schema "user_list_schema.json"

elements.name: Users list successful retrieval with query parameters

steps.name: I set the GET request for endpoint "/api/users"
I send the GET request with query parameters:
the response status code should be 200
the value of "page" should be "2"
the value of "per_page" should be "6"
the value of "total" should be "12"
the value of "total_pages" should be "2"
all fields in the "data" array should not be null
the response body should match the JSON Schema "user_list_schema.json"

elements.name: Users list successful retrieved with invalid query parameters

steps.name: I set the GET request for endpoint "/api/users"
I send the GET request with query parameters "page" and "9999"
the response status code should be 200
the value of "page" should be "9999"
the value of "per_page" should be "6"
the value of "total" should be "12"
the value of "total_pages" should be "2"
the "data" array in the response body should be empty
the response body should match the JSON Schema "user_list_invalid_schema.json"

name: Get List of Users API
description:
As a user of the Reqres API
  I want to retrieve a list of users
  So that I can view and interact with user data

elements.name: Verify response for a valid single user request

steps.name: I set the GET request for endpoint "/api/users"
I send the GET request with query parameters "id" and "2"
the response status code should be 200
the value of "data.id" should be "2"
the value of "data.email" should be "janet.weaver@reqres.in"
the value of "data.first_name" should be "Janet"
the value of "data.last_name" should be "Weaver"
the value of "data.avatar" should be "https://reqres.in/img/faces/2-image.jpg"
the response body should have valid fields "id, email, first_name, last_name, avatar"
the response body should match the JSON Schema "single_user_schema.json"

elements.name: Verify response for an invalid single user request

steps.name: I set the GET request for endpoint "/api/users"
I send the GET request with query parameters "id" and "-1"
the response status code should be 404
the response body should be empty "{}"

elements.name: Verify response for an invalid single user request

steps.name: I set the GET request for endpoint "/api/users"
I send the GET request with query parameters "id" and "abc"
the response status code should be 404
the response body should be empty "{}"

elements.name: Verify response for an invalid single user request

steps.name: I set the GET request for endpoint "/api/users"
I send the GET request with query parameters "id" and "9999"
the response status code should be 404
the response body should be empty "{}"

name: Get Single User API
description:
As a user of the Reqres API
  I want to retrieve details of a single user by their ID
  So that I can view the user's information such as email, name, and avatar

elements.name: Verify successful user update

steps.name: I set the PUT request for endpoint "/api/users" and "1"
I set the request body with "morpheus" and "leader"
I send the PUT request
the response status code should be 200
the value of "name" should be "morpheus"
the value of "job" should be "leader"
the response body should match the JSON Schema "update_user_schema.json"
